page.title: 01JOB CENTRE, CUMNOCK
page.content: In Cumnock and Doon Valley District there are 3968 unemployed 2998 men and 970 women this month which is June 1985. In Cumnock and Sanquhar the percentage unemployed was 23.8 on 9.5.85. Unemployment is highest among 25-55 year olds most of whom have been unemployed for over a year. Pupils leaving school can go on a Youth Training Scheme for a year or two. The Job Centre puts the girl or boy into something suitable to their interests. The Schemes available cover everything you can name from shopwork to garages and gardening. There were 156 vacancies in May 1985 varying from factory work to electricians. Vacancies are mainly for semi-skilled workers though machinist vacancies are for skilled workers. {
